summary: A collection of unit and integration tests that verify AWS Config service operations—including configuration recorders, delivery channels, aggregations, conformance packs, retention settings, ConfigRules, custom Lambda-backed rules, and resource tagging—using the Moto library to mock AWS APIs.
business_intent: Validate that the application correctly interacts with AWS Config APIs, handling creation, description, updating, deletion, pagination, error scenarios, and tag management, thereby ensuring reliable configuration compliance functionality.
